posts.post_content: So glad to have found the forums here. Lots of interesting information. I collected cards in the 80's then sold them all in the late 90's. I was recently at an antique store and found a T206 Stahl. I would like to collect the Boston Red Sox set of T206's. The final 3 I need are the most expensive, Speaker, Cicotte and Kleinow.  I really don't love using eBay and any time I find auctions with more reasonable prices have all ended by the time I discover them. Thanks in advance for any help finding these two. Looking for PSA 1-3.

I have a Kleinow Boston available but it's Beckett graded 1.5.  Polar Bear back and not in the best of shape......

Shoot me a pm if you are interested.
I dont have these cards...... but hwo awesome is it to see a t206 in an antique store. :)

Awesome. I'll take it.

Now just need Tris!
I am still in need of a Speaker (hoping to find one under $100. I thought I had a Cicotte and I didn't,  so looking for that one as well.
Thanks for the heads up,  I won the Cicotte in last week's auction.  Now just a low grade Speaker left to go!
good luck sir! I love T 206.....why stop there at the sox players:confused:;)

$ primarily.  I have all but 6 Topps Red Sox from 1952-2014 and the T206 cards.  Altogether,  I've dropped about $3k in cards in the process.  I'm in education,  so that's a good chunk of change for me!
